casebody.data:
No. 10-9486. Donnell Ponton, Petitioner v. American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees, AFL-CIO, et al. 564 U.S. 1050, 131 S. Ct. 3085,

180 L. Ed. 2d 907,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4971. June 27, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 563 U.S. 995, 131 S. Ct. 2457, 179 L. Ed. 2d 1222, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 3749.
